attributes.action: Improved support for children and adults with autism who are victims of anti-social behaviour and bullying
attributes.additional_details: It is true to say that children and adults with autism are often victims of anti-social behaviour and bullying within some Mainstream Schools/Colleges and the Community. It is time further training is provided by local authorities to these establishments and within the community and give more support to victims and make the people who commit these crimes accountable. It is true to say that many victims are targeted again once they go for help and are often let down by the system and those who are suppose to help.
